Class UpcDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • UpcDecoder

  • public class UpcDecoder
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    baevans decodes a product code given a barcode

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String barCode
      string that represents the binary barcode
      private java.lang.String productCode
      string that represents the 11 digit product code

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UpcDecoder(java.lang.String barCode)
      single argument constructor taking in the binary barcode and making sure its valid

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getBarCode()
      getter method for the barcode
      java.lang.String getProductCode()
      getter method for the product code
      java.lang.String setProductCode(java.lang.String barCode)
      setter method that converts the binary representation to a product code using hasp maps to change it, also checks for valid check digit

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

        getter method for the product code

        string representation of the product code

      • setProductCode

        public java.lang.String setProductCode(java.lang.String barCode)
        setter method that converts the binary representation to a product code using hasp maps to change it, also checks for valid check digit
        Parameters:
        barCode - barcode entered by the user
        Returns:
        returns the final product code associated with the barcode
